segments.text: It ’ s very nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t believe I ’ m actually speaking to a candidate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ask me questions , if you ’ d like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to ask you what your policy is on gay marriage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everyone should be able to love who they want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you make gay marriage legal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know a lot of people wouldn ’ t agree with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that is really cool of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m glad to hear that .
segments.speaker: S2
